name: The Handyman With A Unicycle - Pre-Alpha Demo
name_original: The Handyman With A Unicycle - Pre-Alpha Demo
description:
A new carnival has come to town, and they need a handyman. Opening in a new location each and every day, it’s surprising nothing’s falling apart. Actually, that’s your job! Rides are breaking and it’s your duty to fix them before someone gets hurt (and more importantly they get a lawsuit on their hands)! It’s also company policy that you must do so while riding a unicycle. Repairing things won’t be so easy, as competitor carnivals will try to stop you and shut down the carnival, running you out of your newly acquired job.

You play as Handy Harold Henderson, the new handyman at Peter Avion’s Yesteryear Universally Shifting (P.A.Y. U.S.) Carnival. Equipped with a unicycle, it’s your job to ride around the carnival, dodge obstacles, and fix the attractions before they break.
